hibernate-mapping.query: select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.Eno, rtlf.AcctNo, po.PONo, po.ADate, po.IDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.OtherBank, rtlf.UserNo, rtlf.OrgnEno, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.Amount ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf , TLMORM00016 as po where rtlf.TranCode = 'PORCL' and rtlf.PONo = po.PONo and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) between :startdate and :enddate and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and (po.IDate is not null or po.IDate != '') and rtlf.Active = true and po.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.Eno, rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.Cheque, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.LocalAmt, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.OtherBank, rtlf.UserNo, rtlf.OrgnEno, rtlf.Amount ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where (upper(rtlf.Status) = 'LDR' or upper(rtlf.Status) = 'LCR') and (upper(rtlf.TranCode) = 'CLRECEIPT' or upper(rtlf.TranCode) = 'PORCL' or upper(rtlf.TranCode) = 'RCLDELI') and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) between :startdate and :enddate and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( p.Eno, p.AcctNo, p.Amount, p.ACode, p.HomeAmount, p.HomeAmt, p.HomeOAmt, p.LocalAmount, p.LocalAmt, p.LocalOAmt, p.SourceCur, p.CurCode, p.Cheque, p.PONo, p.DRegisterNo, p.ERegisterNo, p.LgNo, p.LNo, p.Desp, p.Narration, p.DATE_TIME, p.Status, p.TranCode, p.ACSign, p.DomBankPost, p.ClrPostStatus, p.OrgnEno, p.OrgnTranCode, p.OrgnCheque, p.OrgnPONo, p.OrgnDReg, p.OrgnEReg, p.OrgnLgNo, p.OrgnLno, p.UserNo, p.ContraEno, p.ContraLno, p.ContraDate, p.OtherBank, p.DeliverReturn, p.ReceiptNo, p.OtherBankChq, p.OtherBankAcctNo, p.CustId, p.GChqNo, p.ChkTime, p.WorkStation, p.SourceBr, p.Rate, p.SettlementDate, p.Channel, p.RefVNo, p.RefType, p.UId, p.Active, p.TS, p.CreatedUserId, p.CreatedDate, p.UpdatedUserId, p.UpdatedDate ) from PFMORM00042 as p where p.Active = true and p.SourceBr=:sourceBr

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.OtherBank, rtlf.OtherBankChq, bcode.BDesp, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.SettlementDate ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf, TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.OtherBank = bcode.BCode and rtlf.Status = :lcd and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDateTime and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.SourceCur= :sourceCur and rtlf.Active = true and bcode.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.OtherBank, rtlf.OtherBankChq, bcode.BDesp, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.SettlementDate ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf, TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.OtherBank = bcode.BCode and rtlf.Status = :lcd and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDateTime and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.SourceCur= :sourceCur and rtlf.Active = true and bcode.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.Active, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.TranCode, rtlf.OtherBank, rtlf.OtherBankChq, (case when (substring(rtlf.Eno,1,1) = :r) then rtlf.Cheque end), rtlf.OrgnPONo, rtlf.RefVNo, bcode.BDesp, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.PONo, rtlf.RefType ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.OtherBank = bcode.BCode and substring(rtlf.Status,1,1) = :status and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectDate and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.SourceCur= :sourceCur and rtlf.Active = true and bcode.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.Active, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.TranCode, rtlf.OtherBank, rtlf.OtherBankChq, (case when (substring(rtlf.Eno,1,1) = :r) then rtlf.Cheque end), rtlf.OrgnPONo, rtlf.RefVNo, bcode.BDesp, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.PONo, rtlf.RefType ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.OtherBank = bcode.BCode and substring(rtlf.Status,1,1) = :status and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectDate and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.SourceCur= :sourceCur and rtlf.Active = true and bcode.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.OtherBankChq, bcode.BDesp, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf ,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.OtherBank = bcode.BCode and rtlf.Status = :lcd and rtlf.ClrPostStatus = :y and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true and bcode.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.Status = :lcd and rtlf.ClrPostStatus = :y and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.OtherBankChq, bcode.BDesp, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.OtherBank=bcode.BCode and rtlf.Status = :lcd and rtlf.ClrPostStatus = :y and (rtlf.OrgnPONo is null or rtlf.OrgnPONo = '') and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true and bcode.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.Status = :lcd and rtlf.ClrPostStatus = :y and (rtlf.OrgnPONo is null or rtlf.OrgnPONo = '') and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.Status = :lcd or rtlf.Status = :ldp and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.Status = :lcd or rtlf.Status = :ldp and rtlf.Active = true and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and (rtlf.OrgnPONo is null or rtlf.OrgnPONo = '')

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.OtherBankChq, bcode.BDesp, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf ,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.OtherBank = bcode.BCode and rtlf.Status = :lcd and rtlf.ClrPostStatus = :y and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true and bcode.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.Status = :lcd and rtlf.ClrPostStatus = :y and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.OtherBankChq, bcode.BDesp, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.OtherBank=bcode.BCode and rtlf.Status = :lcd and rtlf.ClrPostStatus = :y and (rtlf.OrgnPONo is null or rtlf.OrgnPONo = '') and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true and bcode.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.Eno, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf,TLMORM00040 as bcode where rtlf.Status = :lcd and rtlf.ClrPostStatus = :y and (rtlf.OrgnPONo is null or rtlf.OrgnPONo = '') and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.Status = :lcd or rtlf.Status = :ldp and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo, rtlf.LocalAmount, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.Status = :lcd or rtlf.Status = :ldp and rtlf.Active = true and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDate and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCur and (rtlf.OrgnPONo is null or rtlf.OrgnPONo = '')

select new report_tlfDto (AcctNo,DATE_TIME,LocalAmount,ACSign,Amount) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and month(rtlf.DATE_TIME) = :month and year(rtlf.DATE_TIME) = :year and substring(rtlf.ACSign,1,1) = :acSign and substring(rtlf.Status,2,1) = :status and (rtlf.OrgnEno is null or rtlf.OrgnEno = '') and rtlf.SourceBr = :sourceBr and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( Eno, AcctNo, Desp, Amount ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.ACSign Like :acsign and rtlf.SourceBr = :sourceBr and rtlf.TranCode = :transactioncode and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = Convert(char(10),:datetime,111) and rtlf.SourceCur = : sourceCur and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.Status, rtlf.AcctNo, cs.AccountNo, cs.AccountName, rtlf.Amount, rtlf.LocalOAmt, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.Rate, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceBr ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf, ChargeOfAccountSetup as cs where rtlf.SourceCur = cs.CurrencyCode and cs.AccountName = :od and ((substring(rtlf.ACSign,1,1) = :c and (rtlf.OrgnEno is null or rtlf.OrgnEno = '')) or (rtlf.AcctNo = (select c.AccountNo from ChargeOfAccountSetup as c where c.AccountName = :od)) and (rtlf.OrgnEno is null or rtlf.OrgnEno = '') and (rtlf.OrgnTranCode is null or rtlf.OrgnTranCode = '')) and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCurrency and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDateTime and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.Active = true and cs.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.Status, rtlf.AcctNo, cs.AccountNo, cs.AccountName, rtlf.Amount, rtlf.LocalOAmt, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.Rate, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceBr ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf, ChargeOfAccountSetup as cs where rtlf.SourceCur = cs.CurrencyCode and cs.AccountName = :od and ((substring(rtlf.ACSign,1,1) = :c and (rtlf.OrgnEno is null or rtlf.OrgnEno = '')) or (rtlf.AcctNo = (select c.AccountNo from ChargeOfAccountSetup as c where c.AccountName = :od)) and (rtlf.OrgnEno is null or rtlf.OrgnEno = '') and (rtlf.OrgnTranCode is null or rtlf.OrgnTranCode = '')) and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCurrency and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDateTime and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.Active = true and cs.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.Status, rtlf.AcctNo, cs.AccountNo, cs.AccountName, rtlf.Amount, rtlf.LocalOAmt, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.Rate, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceBr ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf, ChargeOfAccountSetup as cs where rtlf.SourceCur = cs.CurrencyCode and cs.AccountName = :od and ((substring(rtlf.ACSign,1,1) = :c) or (rtlf.AcctNo = (select c.AccountNo from ChargeOfAccountSetup as c where c.AccountName = :od))) and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCurrency and Convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) = :selectedDateTime and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.Active = true and cs.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.Status, rtlf.AcctNo, cs.AccountNo, cs.AccountName, rtlf.Amount, rtlf.LocalOAmt, rtlf.DATE_TIME, rtlf.WorkStation, rtlf.SourceCur, rtlf.Rate, rtlf.SettlementDate, rtlf.SourceBr ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf, ChargeOfAccountSetup as cs where rtlf.SourceCur = cs.CurrencyCode and ((substring(rtlf.ACSign,1,1) = :c) or (rtlf.AcctNo = (select c.AccountNo from ChargeOfAccountSetup as c where c.AccountName = :od))) and rtlf.SourceCur = :selectedCurrency and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :selectedDateTime and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.Active = true and cs.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( ACode, Status, LocalAmt, LocalOAmt, DATE_TIME, WorkStation, SourceCur, SettlementDate, Narration ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and rtlf.SourceCur=:sourceCurrency and rtlf.SourceBr = :branchCode and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :dateTime and (substring(rtlf.Status,1,2)=:cashCreditStatus or substring(rtlf.Status,1,2)=:cashDebitStatus) and (rtlf.OrgnEno is null or rtlf.OrgnEno = '') and rtlf.LocalAmt > 0 and rtlf.Active=true Order By rtlf.ACode,rtlf.Status

select new report_tlfDto( ( select coaSetup.AccountNo from ChargeOfAccountSetup as coaSetup where coaSetup.AccountName=:overDraftStatus and coaSetup.CurrencyCode=:sourceCurrency and coaSetup.SourceBranchCode=:branchCode and coaSetup.Active=true ), Status, LocalAmt, LocalOAmt, DATE_TIME, WorkStation, SourceCur, SettlementDate, Narration ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and rtlf.SourceCur=:sourceCurrency and rtlf.SourceBr = :branchCode and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :dateTime and (substring(rtlf.ACode,1,3)=:currentControlStatus or substring(rtlf.Status,1,2)=:cashCreditStatus or substring(rtlf.Status,1,2)=:cashDebitStatus) and (rtlf.OrgnEno is null or rtlf.OrgnEno = '') and rtlf.LocalOAmt > 0 and rtlf.Active=true

select new report_tlfDto ( ACode, Status, LocalAmt, LocalOAmt, DATE_TIME, WorkStation, SourceCur, SettlementDate, Narration ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and rtlf.SourceCur=:sourceCurrency and rtlf.SourceBr = :branchCode and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :dateTime and (substring(rtlf.Status,1,2)=:cashCreditStatus or substring(rtlf.Status,1,2)=:cashDebitStatus) and rtlf.LocalAmt > 0 and rtlf.Active=true

select new report_tlfDto( ( select coaSetup.AccountNo from ChargeOfAccountSetup as coaSetup where coaSetup.AccountName=:overDraftStatus and coaSetup.CurrencyCode=:sourceCurrency and coaSetup.SourceBranchCode=:branchCode and coaSetup.Active=true ), Status, LocalAmt, LocalOAmt, DATE_TIME, WorkStation, SourceCur, SettlementDate, Narration ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and rtlf.SourceCur=:sourceCurrency and rtlf.SourceBr = :branchCode and Convert(char(10),rtlf.SettlementDate,111) = :dateTime and (substring(rtlf.ACode,1,3)=:currentControlStatus) or (substring(rtlf.Status,1,2)=:cashCreditStatus or substring(rtlf.Status,1,2)=:cashDebitStatus) and rtlf.LocalOAmt > 0 and rtlf.Active=true

select new report_tlfDto ( Active, Eno, AcctNo, OtherBankChq, SourceCur, LocalAmount, DATE_TIME, OtherBank, ClrPostStatus, WorkStation ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.SourceBr = :sourcebr and rtlf.WorkStation = :workstation and rtlf.Active = true and convert(char(10),rtlf.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startdate,111) and convert(char(10),:enddate,111) and ( rtlf.ACSign like 'C%' or rtlf.ACSign like 'S%' or rtlf.ACSign like 'F%')
select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and rtlf.SourceCur=:currency and rtlf.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf left join rtlf.CledgerAcctNo as L where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and L.AccountSign like 'C%' and rtlf.SourceCur=:currency and rtlf.Active = true and L.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf left join rtlf.CledgerAcctNo as L where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and L.AccountSign like 'B%' and rtlf.SourceCur=:currency and rtlf.Active = true and L.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf left join rtlf.CledgerAcctNo as L where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and L.AccountSign like 'H%' and rtlf.SourceCur=:currency and rtlf.Active = true and L.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf left join rtlf.CledgerAcctNo as L where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and L.AccountSign like 'P%' and rtlf.SourceCur=:currency and rtlf.Active = true and L.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf left join rtlf.CledgerAcctNo as L where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and L.AccountSign like 'D%' and rtlf.SourceCur=:currency and rtlf.Active = true and L.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf left join rtlf.CledgerAcctNo as L where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and L.AccountSign like 'S%' and rtlf.SourceCur=:currency and rtlf.Active = true and L.Active = true

select new report_tlfDto ( rtlf.AcctNo ) from PFMORM00042 as rtlf left join rtlf.FledgerAcctNo as F where rtlf.WorkStation = :workStationId and F.AccountSignature like 'F%' and rtlf.SourceCur=:currency and rtlf.Active = true and F.Active = true
delete from PFMORM00042 where SourceBr = :SourceBr and Active = true
